text: Olivier Doll (born 9 June 1973) is a retired Belgian footballer who last played for Lokeren. Before that he played much of his career at Anderlecht, where he failed to become a regular in the first team therefore trying his luck at Lokeren in the summer of 2004. Since that move, he has played 4 matches with the national team (he had already played one match with it in 1997 for the 1998 World Cup qualifying round against Turkey, when he replaced Rudi Smidts after one hour). ==References== *Guardian Football Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Association football central defenders Category:R.F.C. title: Olivier Doll
